etusivu_page_description: Hi I'am Casper and I make stunning websites and performant React.js applications.
header_section_teksti: I make stunning websites and performant web applications. I design and code using modern technologies that enable rapid development and scalability for large audiences. Please be in touch if you want to work with me.
about_nyt_teksti: I started web design and coding when I was setting up a startup company that needed website. Nowadays I write powerful web apps and design seamless user experiences. Iâ€™m looking for informal and creative environment where I can exceed mine and customer's expectations. I am laid back guy and in my free time I enjoy snowboarding, photography and good company.
about_kehitys_teksti: I use modern web technologies such as React, Node and Webpack to make scalable web applications fast and flexible. I have a lot of knowledge of database-driven web services, map applications and content management systems.

hire_me_text: I'm currently looking for a full-time job as a javascript developer. You can reach me best by email or by leaving a callback request.
